metadata.name: Merry Bookshelf #1
metadata.description:
Oh Soon-kyung pays attention to the depth of life and numerous stories contained in folk paintings and conveys the beauty of form that modernizes tradition. In order to revive the natural beauty of Korean color painting, the artist continuously explored paper and pigments, and established the artist's unique world of work with a modern color and dynamic composition based on traditional elements. The <Merry Bookshelf> series, which newly interpreted Moon Bang Sa Woo, shows a friendly atmosphere containing old objects in the modern society of excessive information and learning, but also shows a modern aesthetic with its witty composition and cheerful color. 

#NFTart  #contemporary folk painting   #physical-based
